title: Public Service (Retirement Age) Regulations, 2024
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 183
Gazette dated Friday, 24th May, 2024
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 28 of 2024
The Public Service Pensions Act
(Laws, Volume 15, Cap. 260)
The Public Service (Retirement Age) Regulations, 2024
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 33 of the Public
Service Pensions Act, and in consultation with the Board, the
following Regulations are made:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Service Title
(Retirement Age) Regulations, 2024.
2. In these Regulations, unless the context otherwise requires, Interpretation
“ officer ” has the meaning assigned to the word in the
Act.
3. These Regulations do not apply to— Application
(a) a member of the Defence Force;
(b) an officer of, or below, the rank of Chief Inspector in
the Zambia Police Service; and
(c) an officer of, or below, the rank of Chief Officer III in
the Zambia Correctional Service.
4. Despite section 33 of the Act, an officer— Age of
retirement of
(a) shall retire on the sixtieth anniversary of the date of the officer
officer’s birth; or
(b) may, on giving twelve month’s notice, and subject to the
approval of the President, retire on attaining the age of
fifty-five or sixty five years.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O.Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka Price K4.00 each
184 Statutory Instruments 24th May, 2024
Retirement 5. An officer who retires under regulation 4 shall, with effect
benefits
from the date of the officer’s retirement, be entitled to retirement
benefits as specified under section 41 of the Act.
Revocation 6. The Public Service (Retirement Age) Regulations, 2023 are
of S.I No. 12
revoked.
of 2023
HAKAINDE HICHILEMA,
LUSAKA President
22nd May , 2024
